## CharityORG.luckyReset() method

Performs a lucky reset

**Signature:**

```typescript
luckyReset(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if successful, False if not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Performs a lucky reset if you are able to. Costs 1 Lucky Coin and requires that there be no current events.
